DOC.brief_summary: To investigate whether nasal high frequency oscillation ventilation ( nHFOV ) immediately extubation reduce arterial partial pressure carbon dioxide ( paCO2 ) 72 hour extubation comparison nasal continuous positive airway pressure ( nCPAP ) low birth weight infant ( VLBWs ) .
DOC.brief_title: Nasal High Frequency Oscillation Ventilation Versus Nasal Continuous Positive Airway Pressure Reduce Post-extubation pCO2
DOC.detailed_description: Randomized control clinical trial compare nHFOV v nCPAP immediately extubation VLBW infant . Intervention treatment protocol describe two study arm . Definition treatment failure ( infant meet least one criterion ) : - Sustained pCO2 > 80 mmHg pH < 7.20 confirmed arterial capillary blood gas analysis spite optimize non-invasive respiratory support maximum setting define . - Fraction inspire oxygen ( FiO2 ) > 0.6 maintain peripheral oxygen saturation measure pulse oximetry ( SpO2 ) 90-94 % spite optimize non-invasive respiratory support maximum setting define . - Reintubation ( study patient may intubate time , due clinical consideration , without reach another criterion `` treatment failure '' ) . Sample size : Assuming variability paCO2 previously report difficult-to-wean preterm infant unit ( Czernik C , J Matern Fetal Neonatal Med 2012 ) treatment failure rate 22 % within 72 hour extubation , calculate sample size 34 patient study arm detect difference paCO2 7 mmHg , use two-sided significance 0.05 power 0.8 . Randomization : Sequence generation independent statistician study nurse . Block randomization use least two different block size . Allocation concealment use sequentially number opaque seal envelope . Data monitoring : By independent statistician .
DOC.criteria: Gestational age < 32+0 week Birth weight < 1500 g Received mechanical ventilation via endotracheal tube ≥120 h Caffeine treatment accord unit guideline paCO2 < 65 mmHg pH > 7.2 FiO2 2540 % maintain SpO2 9094 % . Timecycled , pressurecontrolled ventilation : PIP ≤22 cm H2O , PEEP ≤6 cm H2O ; Volume guarantee ventilation : Working Ppeak ≤22 cm H2O , PEEP ≤6 cm H2O ; High frequency oscillation ventilation : Pmean ≤12 cm H2O , Amplitude ≤30 cm H2O Decision attend clinician extubate Major congenital malformation require surgery Ductdependent congenital heart disease Neuromuscular disease Participation another randomize control trial Death reaching eligibility criteria Hydrocortisone treatment time enrolment Chronological age > 28 day
